attributes.action: Stop the ban of XL Bully's
attributes.additional_details: Reconsider potentially destroying thousands of family's by destroying there beloved family pets due to other dogs and bad owners.
attributes.background: Reconsider the ban of XL Bully's, dogs are family to people they cannot just be took away because another dog mixed with a bully has committed a terrible attack not every bully is a bad bully and that needs to be recognised and the problem Bully's should be punished correctly

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Bad owners are to blame not the breed - don't ban the XL bully:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611
